text: Dielitzia is a genus of flowering plants in the daisy family described as a genus in 1989 by Philip Sydney Short.Tropicos, Dielitzia P.S. Short There is only one known species, Dielitzia tysonii, endemic to Western Australia.Flann, C (ed) 2009+ Global Compositae Checklist Florabase, the Western Australia Flora, Dielitzia tysonii P.S.Short ==References== Category:Monotypic Asteraceae genera Category:Flora of Western Australia Category:Taxa named by Philip Sydney Short
title: Dielitzia
